title: The Drifter

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player to Befriend.
- During the day, gain the attributes and abilities of a dead Friend's role tonight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When your Friend dies, you learn what role they were, even if they were cleaned.
- You revert back into The Drifter at the start of each day, losing whatever abilities you copied.
- You may transform into a dead Friend's role an unlimited amount of times.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Rid your county of rapscallions and varmint.

desc:
Post 5348
*Estranged and indifferent, she wanders endlessly with her grandfather's shotgun, seeking nothing but to experience the world laid before her.*
